ygData.subject: Re: The Ikoto
ygData.msgSnippet: Grimlock landed in the midst of the ruble, looking around harshly at the Autobots. See, you can t handle yourself in brawl, what makes you think you can fight

Grimlock landed in the midst of the ruble, looking around harshly at the
Autobots. "See, you can't handle yourself in brawl, what makes you think
you can fight on an alien planet." he then trudged off.

Ironhide shaked his head wearily. He turned to Pacifix. "Any casualties
Pacifix?" he asked.
